_blog_post_body_many:
{_blog_post_body}
Read on
Installed by {_blog_post_json.author} on {_blog_post_json.datedash}
blog_bit: Plenty of reasons to celebrate this episode with several anniversaries - Windows is 29 years old, streaming radio on the web is 20 years old & Firefox is 10 years old - lots of lulz on Twitter starring Kim Cardassian, Bill Cosby, the Queen (yes, that one) & ill-timed tweets during the two minutes silence.
blog_more: We finally got on the Twitter bandwagon so follow us so you can read this again, the snappily named MS14Â­066 Vulnerability so just about every Windows system is vulnerable (no fix for you!), more Leeds Hack interviews, David Cameron threatening the worldwideweb with a report button for extremist content, those cunning germans have created a heat exchange service with their data centres with just one easy payment of 12,000 euros and the next Bradford CoderDojo coming up next week on the 6th of December, 9:30am - 12:30pm at the Innovation Centre Bradford, Peckover Street in Little Germany.
